Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-7104 affecting package sqlite for versions less than 3.39.2-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-7104 affecting package sqlite for versions less than 3.39.2-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package sqlite is earlier than 3.39.2-3, affected by CVE-2023-7104
